item.name: 1. POST a form submission with full valid parameters and values.

formdata.value:
Provincial Committee of the Communist Party
Provincial Committee of the Communist Party (ng b ng Cng sn cp tnh or Tnh y ng Cng sn) is a provincial subordinate of the Communist Party of Vietnam. Since Vietnam is a one party state, the provincial committee of the Communist Party is the most prominent organ of provincial governance.
Each provincial committee of the Communist Party is headed by a Secretary (B th). The Secretary is de facto leader of the province.

item.name: 3. Get publish form without form element

exec: "allowAnonymousSubmissionErrorMessage": "You must be logged in to submit this form. If you are logged in and still cannot post, make sure \"Do not track\" in your browser settings is disabled.",
"malformstepconfigruationErrorMessage": "Improperly formed FormStep configuration. Some steps are attached to pages, while some steps are not attached, or attached to content with no public URL."

item.name: 1. Get form which Form title, Description are defined
2. Get form which 'Show a summary confirmation message after submission' is check, 'Confirmation message'  'Reset Confirmation message' are defined
3. Get form which 'Show a summary confirmation message after submission' isn't check and  'Confirmation message' is defined.
4. Get form which define 'Display page after submission' and  'Display message after form submission'
5. Get form which "Allow anonymous submissions", "Allow multiple submissions from the same IP/cookie", "Show navigation bar if the form has multiple steps", "Store form submissions" are checked
6. Get form which "Allow anonymous submissions", "Allow multiple submissions from the same IP/cookie", "Show navigation bar if the form has multiple steps", "Store form submissions" are not checked
1. Get form contains Text element. Name, Label text, Tooltip, Placeholder text, Predefined value, Auto complete are defined.
2. Get form contains Text element. Validators 'Required', 'Email', 'Date (DD/MM/YYYY)', 'Date (MM/DD/YYYY)', 'Date (YYYY-MM-DD)' is checked.

exec: "message": "Enter a date in the DD/MM/YYYY format.",
"message": "Enter a date in the MM/DD/YYYY format.",
"message": "Enter a date in the YYYY-MM-DD format.",

item.name: 1. Get form contains Text area element.Name, Label text, Tooltip, Placeholder text, Auto Complete are defined
2.Get form contains Text area element. Validators 'Required' is checked, 'Regular expression' is checked and define regular expression.
1.Get form contains Number element. Name, Label text, Tooltip, Placeholder text, Auto Complete are defined.
2. Get form contains Number element. Validators 'Required', 'Integer', 'Positive integer' are checked.
1.Get form contains Range element.Name, Label text, Tooltip, Placeholder text, Min, Max, Step are defined.
1.Get form contains Range element. Name, Label text, Tooltip, Placeholder, Predefined value text are defined.
2. Get form contains Url element. Validators 'Required', 'Regular expression' are checked.
1. Get form contains Selection element. Name, Label text, Tooltip, Placeholder, Auto Complete are defined.
2. Get form contains Selection element. Validators 'Required', 'Allow multiple choices' are checked.
3.Get form contains Selection element. Items are defined and one item is checked by default.
1. Get form contains Multiple or single choice Element element.Name, Label text, Tooltip are defined.
2.Get form contains Selection element. Validators 'Required', 'Allow multiple choices' are checked.
3.Get form contains Selection element. Items are defined and one item is checked by default.
5. Feed change from items defined to Episerver
1. Get form contains Image choice Element element. Name, Label text, Tooltip are defined.
2. Get form contains Image choice element. Validators 'Required', 'Allow multiple choices', 'Show the check box or radio button' are checked.
3.Get form contains Image choice element. Image choices Item are defined.
4. Get form which image items are from uploaded external file
1. Get form contains 'Hidden visitor profiling' element. Geo is defined.
2. Get form contains 'Hidden visitor profiling' element. Profile is defined.
3. Get form contains 'Hidden visitor profiling' element. User agent is defined.
4. Get form contains 'Hidden visitor profiling' element. Visitor groups is defined.
Submit button, Reset button, Form step

1. Get form contains 'Submit button', 'Reset button' elements. Submit button which Name, Label text, Tooltip, Image, Display page after submission are defined. Finalize form  is checked. Reset button which Name, Label text, Tooltip are defined.
2. Get form contains 'Form step' element. Name, Label text, Tooltip, Display step in other content are defined.
1. Get form contains File upload which Name, Label, Max file size, Allowed extensions are defined.

exec: verifyResponseEqual(response.formElements[0].properties.validators.find(x => x.type = 'AllowedExtensionsValidator').model.message, "The upload file format is not allowed or not supported.");
verifyResponseEqual(response.formElements[0].properties.validators.find(x => x.type = 'MaxFileSizeValidator').model.message, "The upload file size should be less than 10 MB.");
